PES University, Bangalore

Banashankari, Bengaluru
PES University, located in Bangalore, India is one of the country’s leading teaching and research universities. The University is committed to providing “navigation for the real world” that inspires students to find their true north. Courses offered by institute are recognized and acknowlegded by approving bodies like AICTE. Most importantly, these courses with 1204 seats are imparted at affordable fees, which increase accessibility and allow students the opportunity to gain knowledge and skills in their chosen field. PES College of Engineering offered courses and their fee ranged INR 84,270-175,240 for a total of 1204 seats. For students institute have extraordinary facilities & infrastructure like Auditorium, Boys Hostel, Cafeteria, Girls Hostel, Gym, Hospital / Medical Facilities, Hostel, Labs, Library, Sports Complex, Wi-Fi Campus.
Admission to all the B.Tech Programmes for the year 2024 is based on any one of the following: Admission through KCET – Candidate to take KCET entrance test and attend counseling at the KCET cell to secure admission
  • Admission through JEE Mains – Candidate to register for B.Tech (JEE) from https://www.pessat.com/ and appear for counseling at PES University to secure admission Admission through PESSAT – Candidate to register for B.Tech from https://www.pessat.com/ and take PESSAT entrance exam and appear for counseling at PES University to secure admission
  • Admission through Higher Fee Category (Management Quota)
  • Please contact the Office of Admissions at PES University for further information on this or write to admissions@pes.edu

    • We are happy that you have found interest at PES University.
    Application for BTech 2024 is open.

    B.Tech courses available:

    • B.Tech Computer Science Engineering
    • B.Tech Artificial Intelligence Engineering
    • B.Tech Electronics and Communication Engineering
    • B.Tech Electrical and Electronics Engineering
    • B.Tech Biotechnology
